title: The Sand Creek Massacre
description:
November 29, 1864. A peaceful Native American settlement is ambushed by US soldiers, whose indiscriminate slaughter of women and children will spark a decade of war on the Great Plains.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
